name: Metro City - Unreal Prototype
description:
Here is my level design document for a game project based on a metro city on Unreal Engine.

I was inpired a lot by Metro games, it's a adventure type of game where you evolved on a underground areas.

The civilisation lives in poor condition and some city has got better chance in this universe where high class people defend it by putting military checkpoint in the tunnel.

Artstation : 

Project start in 2023
